## InputValidationError.getInvalidFields() method

Gets all field names that have validation errors.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getInvalidFields(): string[];
```
**Returns:**

string\[\]

Array of field names with validation errors

## Example


```typescript
const invalidFields = validationError.getInvalidFields();
invalidFields.forEach(field => {
  highlightFieldError(field);
});
```
